languages.text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я вознагражу тебя. Возьми это грозное оружие — оно отлично показало себя в схватке с ксеносами и помогло добыть более значимый дар, что я привез".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я компенсирую твои труды. Есть у меня один славный завоеванный мирок, до которого все никак не дойдут руки. Пусть он пойдет в довесок к более значимому дару, что я привез".

languages.text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."
languages.original_text: "Что же, поскольку ты меня приятно удивил{mf||а}, а также не позволил{mf||а} Инцендии прибрать к рукам мою собственность, я вознагражу тебя. Возьми это грозное оружие — оно отлично показало себя в схватке с ксеносами и помогло добыть более значимый дар, что я привез".

traits.locale_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

"Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I will compensate you for your efforts. I have a nice little world I conquered that I can never seem to get around to. I'll throw it in along with the more substantial gift I have brought."

languages.text: 「まあ、お前が予想外の功績を働き、俺のものをひったくったインセンディアを止めてくれたことには報酬をやらないとな。この厳つい武器を受取ってくれ。こいつが異種族との戦いで素晴らしい働きをしてくれたおかげで、持ってきたのより価値のある贈答品を手に入れることができたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、お前が予想外の功績を働き、俺のものをひったくったインセンディアを止めてくれたことには報酬をやらないとな。この厳つい武器を受取ってくれ。こいつが異種族との戦いで素晴らしい働きをしてくれたおかげで、持ってきたのより価値のある贈答品を手に入れることができたんだ」

languages.text: “既然你给我准备了这样的惊喜，又阻止了因森蒂娅染指我的财产，我应该奖励你一下才是。收下这把可怕的武器吧，它最适合用来屠杀异形。我还带来了另一件更加贵重的礼物，这件礼物也是在这把武器的帮助下顺利得到的。”
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: “既然你给我准备了这样的惊喜，又阻止了因森蒂娅染指我的财产，我应该奖励你一下才是。收下这把可怕的武器吧，它最适合用来屠杀异形。我还带来了另一件更加贵重的礼物，这件礼物也是在这把武器的帮助下顺利得到的。”

languages.text: «Bueno, puesto que ha resultado ser una sorpresa grata y ha evitado que Incendia me arrebatara mi propiedad, le compensaré sus esfuerzos. Llévese esta siniestra arma. Ha resultado ser excelente en combate contra xenos y me ayudó a obtener un regalo más sustancial que he traído».
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, puesto que ha resultado ser una sorpresa grata y ha evitado que Incendia me arrebatara mi propiedad, le compensaré sus esfuerzos. Llévese esta siniestra arma. Ha resultado ser excelente en combate contra xenos y me ayudó a obtener un regalo más sustancial que he traído».

languages.text: « Bon, puisque vous m'avez agréablement surpris et que vous avez empêché Incendia de s'emparer de ma propriété, je vous dois une récompense. Prenez donc cette arme redoutable ; elle a fait des miracles face aux xénos, et elle m'a également aidé à prendre possession de l'autre présent plus substantiel que je vous ai apporté. »
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: « Bon, puisque vous m'avez agréablement surpris et que vous avez empêché Incendia de s'emparer de ma propriété, je vous dois une récompense. Prenez donc cette arme redoutable ; elle a fait des miracles face aux xénos, et elle m'a également aidé à prendre possession de l'autre présent plus substantiel que je vous ai apporté. »

languages.text: "Tja, da Ihr Euch als angenehme Überraschung erwiesen und Incendia daran gehindert habt, sich meinen Besitz unter den Nagel zu reißen, werde ich Euch belohnen. Nehmt diese grimmige Waffe ... sie hat mir in Kämpfen mit Xenos vortreffliche Dienste erwiesen und half mir, das bedeutendere Geschenk zu erlangen, das ich mitgebracht habe.
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: "Tja, da Ihr Euch als angenehme Überraschung erwiesen und Incendia daran gehindert habt, sich meinen Besitz unter den Nagel zu reißen, werde ich Euch belohnen. Nehmt diese grimmige Waffe ... sie hat mir in Kämpfen mit Xenos vortreffliche Dienste erwiesen und half mir, das bedeutendere Geschenk zu erlangen, das ich mitgebracht habe.

languages.text: "Pekâlâ, hoş bir sürpriz sunup İncendia'nın mülkümü çalmasını engellediğin için çabalarının seni ödüllendireceğim. Bu korkunç silahı al. Zenolara karşı savaşlarda harika iş çıkardı ve getirdiğim daha değerli hediyeyi edinmeme yardımcı oldu."
languages.original_text: "Well then, since you have turned out to be a pleasant surprise and stopped Incendia from snatching my possession, I should reward you. Take this grim weapon — it performed superbly in battles against xenos, and it helped me acquire the more substantial gift I have brought."

traits.locale_text: "Pekâlâ, hoş bir sürpriz sunup İncendia'nın mülkümü çalmasını engellediğin için çabalarının seni ödüllendireceğim. Bu korkunç silahı al. Zenolara karşı savaşlarda harika iş çıkardı ve getirdiğim daha değerli hediyeyi edinmeme yardımcı oldu."
